subject: Maintenace and repair of roads and appointment of Site Engineer.
text: HRly 77riq TTHrf gfeab <UT {An Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (7ea; 4az7t a1r TTTHTf te14) #8 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 MI National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 4-5 & 6, #F -10, ErW, T fozi-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn 24th January 2014 POLCY MATTER Technical (149/2014) [Decision taken_in.176'h meeting of Executive_ Committee held on30.12.2013 vide Agenda Item No6] Sub: Maintenance and repair of roads and appointment of Site Engineer: Following policy circulars have been issued regarding delegation of powers and procedure to be followed with respect to maintenance and repair of roads: Policy Matters Technical (135/2013) dated 31.05.2013 Matters Admn/Finance (88/2012) dated 01.08.2012 (iii) Policy Matters Admn/Finance (86/2012) dated 23.07.2012 (iv) Matters Admn/Finance (31/2008) dated 01.05.2008 Policy Matters Admn/Finance (30/2008) dated 16.04.2008 (vi) Matters Admn/Finance (8/2007) dated 13.02.2007 (vii) Policy Matters Admn/Finance (123/2006) dated 18.05.2006 (viii) Policy Matters Admn/Finance (81/2004) dated 13.04.2004 2 Further, the matter relating to norms for maintenance and repairs, delegation of powers for sanction of maintenance estimates, approval of bids for maintenance works and appointment of Site Engineer for repair works was deliberated in the 176th Meeting of Executive Committee held on 30.12.2013 and the following has been decided: Maintenance of the road where declaration of appointed date is delayed:- It was decided that in cases where declaration of appointed date are delayed, maintenance of the existing road may be taken up as per the requirement: If the road condition requires renewal with bituminous layer, the same may also be considered. Regional Officer shall provide proper justification for the provisions in the estimate to be sanctioned keeping in view the likely achievement of appointed date and concerned Member shall have the power to decide on the scope of the maintenance estimate. II Norms for Maintenance and Repairs: - It was decided that the norms may be based on norms prescribed/ adopted by Ministry for similar type of work. Separate orders will be issued in this regard.
